translations.CONFIRM_DELETE_FILE: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
translations.SUCCESS_DELETE_FILE: The file has been successfully deleted
translations.GET_FILE_LINK: Get the link to embed for this file
translations.ERROR_FILE_ID_ALREADY_EXIST: Please give an identifier for your file
translations.ERROR_FILE_ID_MUST_BEGIN_WITH_LETTER: The identifier must start with a letter
translations.ERROR_FILE_ID_MUST_CONTAIN_ONLY_NUMS_AND: The identifier must contain only numbers and letters
translations.FILE_ID_TOOLTIP: The identifier must begin with a letter and must contain only numbers and letters.
